Posts.EditableText:
Did you mean ConvLib? Assuming you do, go to the Conversation tab for the first topic, and find the box that says "Show these after showing for the first time". Click on the Add, and type the name (not the alias) of the secondary topic. Make sure the secondary topic is a "Conversaton Topic", not a "Starting Conversation Topic".

If you want the new topic to appear imediately, without the player typing SPEAK TO BOB, make sure you have the most recent verson of ConvLib, then tick the Active Conversations check box for this character.
